snippet: The district attorney’s office did not say whether it would open an investigation into accounts of sexual abuse at the prestigious private school, but it encouraged any victims to come forward.
abstract: Bronx district attorney's office says it is interested in hearing any reports of sexual abuse of the students at the Horace Mann School, regardless of when they occurred, in an effort to address the rising concern about faculty behavior at the prestigious private school; office does not say whether it is opening any criminal investigations.
lead_paragraph: The district attorney’s office did not say whether it would open an investigation into accounts of sexual abuse at the prestigious private school, but it encouraged any victims to come forward.

headline.seo: Bronx Prosecutor Seeks Reports of Past Abuse at Horace Mann
headline.main: Bronx Prosecutor Seeks Reports of Past Abuse at Horace Mann
headline.print_headline: Reports Sought Of Past Abuse At Elite School
